actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide authorizations for appropriations for the Civil Aeronautics Board for fiscal years 1976, 1977, and 1978.

summary.text: Authorizes under the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 appropriations for the Civil Aeronautics Board for fiscal years 1976, 1977, and 1978.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide authorizations for appropriations for the Civil Aeronautics Board for fiscal years 1976, 1977, and 1978.
